divs: sighting detailsme and my boyfriend went for a walk on the nearest mountain, and we were watching the sunset and the moon when we saw the object just apeared on the sky. first we tought it was a chinese lantern, but its not possible to be a chinese lantern, because it went so hight in the sky. that was when we realized it was a ufo right in front of us. it went in a straight path on the sky, going up, and it didnt made sound or noise. my boyfriend started recording the object on his camera while i was watching it with my own eyes. we lost sight of the object because it desapeard. in one second it was going up and glowing and in the other it just desapeard. http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=hiczkod3wa0&feature=channel_video_title http:\\www.youtube.com\watch?v=tmyrvekkucw&feature=channel_video_title
